column1: Little Goat Diner////The bulls-eye french toast was just A-OK. I thought that it left something to be desired. It was tasty
column2: but it wasn't extremely good. The burger was really good
column3: but it was kind of salty. Lastly the drink itself was not too good. Personally
column4: I don't like the taste of goat Â or lamb because it has a certain taste and smell. I should have known that goat milk would have that taste. HOWEVER
column5: thankfully the server came and noticed that my friend and I didn't touch our drinks at all. She gladly switched it for regular lattes
